Speaker: tour guide
Dialogue: Welcome to the main headquarters of Precrime.  Smaller Precrime branches are scattered throughout the United States.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Must be a glitch ...

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Anderson just got IdentiScanned.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Where is he?

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: But he's had his eyes done.  Right? Sir?  Tries to think it through.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: He had to have.

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, sir.  He's in the basement of this building.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: This is ridiculous.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: Standing orders from the Security Panel, sir.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: If he wants to get to me, he'll get to me.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: No, he won't, sir.

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Don't worry, air -emergency generators will kick on in five seconds.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Explanation, please!

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Uh, sir.  It seems ... he got the generators, too.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Shit.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Save us, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: I have to get out of here.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Save us.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You let me get here, didn't you? You stopped giving them information, so they couldn't track me.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Save -- And what can Anderson do but catch her before she falls? What can he do but throw her over his shoulder, and in the fading light of the flare, make a run for freedom.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Help me, Paul.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Why didn't the Precogs know he was coming to do this?

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: We won't let that happen, sir.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: You won't, huh?

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: They're a hive mind, sir.  It takes three for their predictive abilities to be fully operational.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: These two are all I have to find the man who is about to murder me.  Hook them up, and flood them with whatever kind of fucking chemicals you have to.  They are a machine, and I need that machine at my disposal.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Your IdentiScan is off, Ennis.  I could just walk in here.

Speaker: page
Dialogue: I forgot.  To turn it on.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: You don't look surprised to see me.

Speaker: page
Dialogue: He took one of my babies.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: He's desperate, Ennis.  He had to.  We have to help him.

Speaker: page
Dialogue: I delivered ... a fake .. to him?

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: But he thought it was real, and ran with it.

Speaker: page
Dialogue: He spilled coffee everywhere ... Everywhere ...

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: What coffee?  What are you -- ?

Speaker: female
Dialogue: My brothers aren't here.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You didn't even look around.  You knew.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: We can sense each other.  You must save

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Stop.  I saved You.  It was the best I could do.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Thank you, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: What am I going to do with you?

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Name me, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Give me a name.  I've never had one.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Listen.

Speaker: female
Dialogue: Rose.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  They shifted your precognition so you would locate me.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Yes.  And it hurt us, physically. Did you know that?  The helmets, the controls.  It hurts.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: I didn't know.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: We saw our chance.  You would need to shut us down, you would have to come.  We wanted you to come.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You used me -- to save you.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: I have been used all my life, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  What's going to happen to us? Can you see that?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: I'm weak.  And away from my brothers. I see glimpses and hints of things nearby.  But it's all ... scattered.  I'm tired of the future, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You didn't know I was going to do that, did you?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: No.  Oh, Anderson.  It was lovely.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: Who else could it've been?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Page worshipped the system.  He fell apart.  Shot himself.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: Anderson.

Speaker: holographic doctor
Dialogue: Director Witwer.  This event is a positive homicide.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: There.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: The one on the left, the first disc -it's a fake.  He doesn't have blue eyes anymore.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: A fake.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Exactly.  You can't tamper with the Precogs, induce them to make fakes

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Bypass the Precogs and slip a fake disc in with that day's real ones...

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: We're all programmed to believe anything we see on a Precog disc. The system has never been wrong ...

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: It's gone too far, Lisa She shakes her head, shocked at his response

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: He was set up!  You both were.  If Paul kills you, you're both out of the picture.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Who wants us out?  Of what picture?

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Jesus, Ed. Stop this thing!  And then we can investigate Witwer's mouth opens and closes.  He tries again.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Ennis Page was murdered last night.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: He's not a murderer.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: I think he is.  A murderer ... and a future murderer.  Lisa.  What does it matter that the first disc is a fake ... if the second one's real?

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  Listen to me.  I'm going to leave you here.  I have to keep moving.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: No.  You must save my brothers.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: It's impossible.  There's no time. I've done what I can do!

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Come here, Anderson.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: It was impossible to save that boy -- but you did, Anderson.  It's in you.  It's what you are.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You knew it wasn't impossible.  That I'd get there.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: You are a man who saves others.  Save my brothers.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: I'm in a lot of trouble right now.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: My brothers are in more trouble. They've moved them to ... an awful place.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  Ed Witwer -he's in the most trouble of all.  Who saves him?

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  Try to drink.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Your wife.  We have to get her here, Anderson.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Why?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: I don't know ...

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: What are you seeing?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Glimpses, Anderson.  Please.  We have to get her here.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You're scaring me, Rose

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Stop talking.  It uses me up.

Speaker: secretary
Dialogue: Sir?  I'm sorry, she stepped out for a few minutes.  Sir?

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Hello?  Hello?

Speaker: anderson's voice
Dialogue: I need you.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Two hundred dollars if you don't scan me.

Speaker: man
Dialogue: You bite me, bitch, I'll pull your teeth out.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Cut it a little close there, honeybunch.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose got the street wrong.  She's getting weak.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Rose?

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Two discs.  One fake.  One real.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: I don't think there were supposed to be two.  Whoever planned it, wasn't counting on two.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: An infallible system.  Every disc ever generated has been true ...

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Somebody wants you out of the way -- so they make a fake disc.  Who ever doubts the discs?

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: I never doubted it.  I saw it.  And believed it, absolutely.  I was certain I was going to murder Witwer.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: And generated the second disc.  The real one.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: A self-fulfilling prophesy.  I believed it was true.  And that made it true.

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: We see what we see.  I'm sorry, Anderson.  It's been predicted.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: We can't take chances, sir

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: The event.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: I've been ordered to get you onto the craft.  By force if necessary.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: The event is inevitable, Lieutenant.

Speaker: lieutenant glaser
Dialogue: I don't leave this room without you, sir.  The Security Panel insists.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Nobody could slip a fake disc past Ennis Page Lisa shakes her head.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: He was the weak link in the perfect system.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Obsessive compulsive niners can't allow changes in the routine

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Something threw him off.  Someone was in his office with him. And coffee spilled ...

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  What is it?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: We weren't just lost in the future. We were in the Chamber, too.  Our eyes were open.  In the present.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Your eyes were open.  What did you see, Rose?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Who would I have told?  Who ever talked to us?  Who cared that we could talk?

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose.  Who spilled the coffee? Straight ahead ...

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Ed ...

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: The perfect system -brought down by a cup of coffee.  My god.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: What makes me leave this room?  If I stay here I won't kill him.  Right?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: You see, if you think you can put me on a hovercraft and save me, then you don't believe in the infallibility of the Precog system.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Things quiet?

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Sir.  Should you ... be here?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: There's been a development.  A body's been found in the Sprawl.

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Anderson's?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: They're checking it out.  I need to see what the Precogs have seen.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Borrowed this from the technicians' lounge.  You don't think they'll mind, do you?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: No, no.  This is exactly where I should be.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: And tv's so good for that -- soothes the mind.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: And that's because ... ?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Do you think they know where Anderson is?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: They know how to find Anderson for me.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Jesus Christ.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: Come on, Rose.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: One hour.  We hold it together for an hour, Witwer lives -- and I'm not a murderer.

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: She won't last an hour.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Rose!

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: He's killed him, Anderson!

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Did he kill both of them, Rose? Rose!

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: Does it matter, Anderson?

Speaker: lisa
Dialogue: If you leave this room...

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Then I'm a cop, just trying to do hisjob.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Is he coming?  No?  Yes?  Maybe?  I think yes.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: I figured, since I can see the future, too, maybe I could get a little disc action going.  Just kidding.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: There's never anything good on, you know?

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: There.  That's the old Paul.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You're not the old Ed. You've lost it.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: You lost it.  You went weak in the knees, partner.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: I'm not your partner.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: The air went out of you when Frank D'Ignazio killed himself.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: He was guilty.  I accepted that.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: No you didn't.  The doubts were creeping in on you.  The lab trying to engineer more Precogs ... Malcolm pressuring you to expand ...

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Never been my style.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Precrime needs to grow.  You would have stood in its way.  The Security Panel wouldn't have understood that. What you're capable of.  What a bulldog you are.  Look what you've been doing to us all week.  Amazing.  You're the best.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: So you took matters into your own hands.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: I understood the threat.  I understood YOU

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You killed a Precog.  You ended the system you wanted to protect.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Wrong.  This lab will make more. Believe it, Paul.

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Knowing the exact moment of your death -it's made you crazy, Ed.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: You sonofabitch!

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: That's right.  No gun.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: You see?!  That's exactly what I'm talking about.  You don't Believe!

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: You can't have it both ways.  You don't want to die.  That's why you lured me here -- to kill me first.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Pick it up

Speaker: anderson
Dialogue: Let's not do this, Ed Witwer trains his gun on Anderson.  Anderson trains his gun on Witwer.

Speaker: witwer
Dialogue: Now do you believe?

Speaker: rose
Dialogue: James.  Can you guess what I'm thinking?

Speaker: james
Dialogue: NO.
